original_text: And the people came up out of Jordan on the tenth day of the first month, and encamped in Gilgal, in the east border of Jericho.
korean_text: 첫째 달 십일에 백성이 요단에서 올라와 여리고 동쪽 경계 길갈에 진 치매

sentences.original_text: And the people came up out of Jordan
on the tenth day of the first month
in the east border of Jericho
